markup.raw: There are no states created with this markup because it is the second markup annotation in the comment block and there was no id set so the id is 1 by default. If you are looking for an example of multiple markup blocks with seperate states see `state-multiple-markup-blocks-with-different-states.scss`
markup.escaped:
<div class="something-super-awesome">
  There are no states created with this markup because it is the
  second markup annotation in the comment block and there was no
  id set so the id is 1 by default. If you are looking for an example
  of multiple markup blocks with seperate states see
  `state-multiple-markup-blocks-with-different-states.scss`
</div>

If you are looking for an example of multiple markup blocks with seperate states see `state-multiple-markup-blocks-with-different-states.scss`
